com.datasift.dropwizard.kafka.consumer

Class MessageProcessor<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datasift.dropwizard.kafka.consumer.MessageProcessor<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the decoded type of the message to process
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    StreamProcessor<T>

    public abstract class MessageProcessor<T>
extends Object
implements StreamProcessor<T>
    Processes messages of type T from a Kafka message stream.

    This StreamProcessor is instrumented with Metrics; specifically, a Timer that tracks the time taken to process each message in the stream.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageProcessor()
      Creates a MessageProcessor; registers Metrics with the default registry.
      MessageProcessor(com.yammer.metrics.core.MetricsRegistry registry)
      Creates a MessageProcessor; registers Metrics with the given MetricsRegistry.
